pages.text: The most $(italics)beginner-unfriendly$(reset) school of magic out there!$(br)$(br)Seriously, this school of magic is very complex. Probably not worth it if you only want to dabble in magic and not go very deeply into it.$(br)$(br)You can get similar results for $(italics)a lot less effort$(reset) in other magic schools, in most cases.

So why does this even exist? Is this ever worth it, you ask?$(br)$(br)Oh, once you take the time to master this form of magic, it has the most potential to shape the world to your vision. Expert Hex Casters are respected around here.$(br)$(br)Consult the $(italics)Hex Notebook$(reset) in your Starter Hut to get started, if you are brave enough.
